/applicant/person/governmentIDs/idValue.helperMessage: In some countries, Social Security Number can only be used for certain purposes, such as for payroll processing or tax reporting. We recommend that you consult with local counsel to determine when collection of this information is permissible.

/applicant/person/communication/emails/e.helperMessage: In some countries, collection of an employees personal contact information may be restricted. We recommend that you consult with local counsel to determine whether collection of this information is permissible.

/applicant/person/maritalStatusCode.helperMessage: In some countries, an employees marital status can be collected only for certain purposes, such as when needed for payment of compensation. We recommend that you consult with local counsel to determine whether collection of this information is permissible.
